fields.summary: Unknown meta-data request should return 404 only

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue is undergoing QA.  See linked QA issue(s) for progress.
status.name: In QA

fields.description:
*Assessment* If a user launches an instance without passing an instance profile, and tries to access the metadata service for an instance profile, there is a huge Java stack trace returned. In AWS, a _404 - Not Found_ is returned. *Signs* When attempting to do a curl against http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/, the following is returned: {code} ubuntu@ip-172-17-190-153:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/ 404 - Not Found

404 - Not Found: failed to find meta-data/iam/

com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message String to service VmMetadata because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmMetadata.component}. Message payload is of type: String

Caused by: java.util.NoSuchElementException: Failed to lookup path: iam/

404 - Not Found

{code} *Steps* * Set up a Eucalyptus 3.4 cloud * Run an instance without passing an instance profile: {code} euca-run-instances -k euca-admin emi-C25538DA -t m1.large -z Legend --user-data-file=cloud-init.config {code} * Attempt to grab information from the iam directory of the meta-data service: {code} $ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/ {code} *Workarounds* N/A
fields.summary: Stack Trace Returned When Trying to Access IAM directory Through Metadata service from Instance Launched without an Instance Profile

comments.body:
Here is the output with the curl using the -i option: *Eucalyptus* {code} ubuntu@ip-172-17-190-153:~$ curl -i http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/ HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: 35148 404 - Not Found

404 - Not Found: failed to find meta-data/iam/

com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message String to service VmMetadata because: Component that caused exception is: DefaultJavaComponent{VmMetadata.component}. Message payload is of type: String
...
{code}

*AWS*
{code}
ubuntu@ip-10-28-32-161:~$ curl -i http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/
HTTP/1.0 404 Not Found
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 345
